solution_line_template: If Emilio presents {emilio_gifts} gifts and Jorge {jorge_gifts} gifts, together they have presented {emilio_gifts}+{jorge_gifts}=<<{emilio_gifts}+{jorge_gifts}={gifts_emilio_jorge}>>{gifts_emilio_jorge} gifts.
If Pedro also gives Rosalinda {pedro_gifts} gifts, Rosalinda's total number is {gifts_emilio_jorge}+{pedro_gifts} = <<{gifts_emilio_jorge}+{pedro_gifts}={total_gifts}>>{total_gifts} gifts.
